metadata.title: CVE-2021-44716 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Compliant (focal) - medium
metadata.description:
net/http in Go before 1.16.12 and 1.17.x before 1.17.5 allows uncontrolledmemory consumption in the header canonicalization cache via HTTP/2requests.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2021-44716` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

google-guest-agent - 20231004.02-0ubuntu1~20.04.3
No subscription required

criterions.comment: google-guest-agent package in focal was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '20231004.02-0ubuntu1~20.04.3').
golang-golang-x-net-dev package in focal is affected and needs fixing.
